00072     public function handleThemeChangeRequest()
00073     {
00074         $_sTheme = PS::o( $_REQUEST, '__theme' );
00075         $_sUri = PS::o( $_REQUEST, '__uri' );
00076         
00077         $_arThemes = CPSjqUIWrapper::getValidThemes();
00078         $_sTheme = PS::o( $_arThemes, $_sTheme, CPSjqUIWrapper::getCurrentTheme() );
00079         
00080         if ( $_sTheme && $_sUri && in_array( $_sTheme, $_arThemes ) )
00081         {
00082             Yii::app()->user->setState( CPSjqUIWrapper::getStateName(), $_sTheme );
00083             $this->redirect( $_sUri );
00084         }
00085 
00086         return true;
00087     }
